content: the end of the row r23 *k1c1* all round r24 *k1c1* all around r25 *k1c1 k1c2* - repeat to the end of the row r26 *k1c1* all around r27 *k1c1* all around r28 *k1c1* all around total length is approximately 15cm / 5 5 crown remember to knit all of the even numbered rounds and decrease on the odd numbered rounds switch to double pointed needles when necessary r29 *k1c2 k3c1 k1c2 k1c1 k2tog in c1* 9 times switch to c1 only cut c2 r30 and all even row to r38 *k1c1* all around r31 *k5c1 k2tog* - repeat to the end of the row cut yarn leaving at least 15cm 6 inches pull yarn through remaining stitches to close the hat weave in ends on the inside add a pompom if desired 5 large size only r18 *k1c1 k1c2* - repeat to the end of the row cut yarn leaving at least 15cm 6 inches pull yarn through remaining stitches to close the hat weave in ends on the inside add a pompom if desired 6
